item.title: A Summer at Gunpoint
item.author: Aviv Beeri,
item.description: Lets turn the clock back to the end of the summer term, 2013. The days were long and hard, but then the term ended, and all was well. And suddenly I found myself with much more time for gaming. This in turn allowed me to finally catch up with a game I had been anticipating for a year, Gunpoint. I’d …
